info.name: Music Player Network - Clean Dark
info.description: This is an alternate dark theme for forums hosted on the Music Player Network <forums.musicplayer.com>. Certain extraneous graphical elements have been removed.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.2

The site "forums.musicplayer.com" presentation provides seven user selectable styles, UBBT77 - Dar, UBT70, etc. Each style has a unique css file.  This theme is intended to have the same appearance regardless of the selected user style sheet.  It must override a union of all the elements of all seven user-selectable style sheets.
